title: just logged on today tried to play league and it wont let me HELPPPP
body: it keeps saying unexpected error occurred and it wont let me download the latest patch or anything help???

replies.body:
This is a great starting point. For 'unexpected errors' during patching, there are a few different stages at which it can occur and patching can fail. From 0-32% your patcher is scanning local files and checking for corrupted or missing files, along with determining where the new files will go. Errors here are often caused by [problems with system permissions.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) 

From 33% and onward, your patcher is downloading and applying the patch files, which heavily relies on a good connection to the server. Errors at this point are typically caused by an unstable connection, and our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) touches on a lot of solutions for this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
